Class CO2FootprintV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • CO2FootprintV1

  • public class CO2FootprintV1
extends java.lang.Object
    Calculates the amount of carbon dioxide emitted for each gallon of gas consumed.
    Version:
    1/4/2015
    Author:
    Cole Hudson
